text: iṟutiyāka, nam uttaravu vantu, aṭuppup poṅkavē, (nām nūhai nōkki;)"uyirp pirāṇikaḷ ovvoru vakaiyiliruntum (āṇ peṇ koṇṭa) ovvoru jōṭiyai (akkappalil) ēṟṟik koḷḷum; (mūḻkaṭikkappaṭuvārkaḷ eṉṟu evarkaḷaik kuṟittu muṉpē nam) vākku ēṟpaṭṭuviṭṭatō avarkaḷait tavir um kuṭumpattāraiyum, īmāṉ koṇṭavarkaḷaiyum ēṟṟikkoḷḷum" eṉṟu nām kūṟiṉōm; veku coṟpa makkaḷait tavira maṟṟavarkaḷ avaruṭaṉ īmāṉ koḷḷavillai
